Description:
Detects suspicious shell commands used in various exploit codes (see references)

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Activity in Shell Commands
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%wget * - http* | perl%' or log like '%wget * - http* | sh%' or log like '%wget * - http* | bash%' or log like '%python -m simplehttpserver%' or log like '%-m http.server%' or log like '%import pty; pty.spawn*%' or log like '%socat exec:*%' or log like '%socat -o /tmp/*%' or log like '%socat tcp-connect*%' or log like '%*echo binary >>*%' or log like '%*wget *; chmod +x*%' or log like '%*wget *; chmod 777 *%' or log like '%*cd /tmp || cd /var/run || cd /mnt*%' or log like '%*stop;service iptables stop;*%' or log like '%*stop;susefirewall2 stop;*%' or log like '%chmod 777 2020*%' or log like '%*>>/etc/rc.local%' or log like '%*base64 -d /tmp/*%' or log like '%* | base64 -d *%' or log like '%*/chmod u+s *%' or log like '%*chmod +s /tmp/*%' or log like '%*chmod u+s /tmp/*%' or log like '%* /tmp/haxhax*%' or log like '%* /tmp/ns_sploit*%' or log like '%nc -l -p *%' or log like '%cp /bin/ksh *%' or log like '%cp /bin/sh *%' or log like '%* /tmp/*.b64 *%' or log like '%*/tmp/ysocereal.jar*%' or log like '%*/tmp/x *%' or log like '%*; chmod +x /tmp/*%' or log like '%*;chmod +x /tmp/*%')
